transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haanji, good morning sir.
Executive: Good morning Lovely ma'am. Uh, main keh raha tha ki aap ek baar hum video meet se connect kar sakte hain jahan pe aap mujhe bata paye ki kaun si images hatani hai wahan se?
Customer: Okay, abhi to main delete kar rahi thi sir.
Executive: Achha, aap delete kar rahe hain? Haanji, main delete kar rahi thi. Jo photos kar rahi thi main delete.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Aur delete ke saath-saath jo usme images aane hain, uske details aapke system pe available hain?
Customer: Haanji, kuch hai hum log koi photos ke size kam hai to usse wo delete kar rahi. Jo jo matlab hai uske size mein to wo kar rahi hu saath saath.
Executive: Achha, size ka aap kar rahe hain. Aur uske saath-saath na ek cheez aur dekhni thi.
Executive: Jaise aap kisi kisi product mein dekh rahe honge ki specification ka jo important specification hai wo missing hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, to usme dekhiye add karke missing karke option aa raha hoga specification slash additional details.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To usme view more pe jab aap click karenge na to wo jo product ka important specification hai wo fill karne ka option aayega. Jaise main example ke taur pe main ek example ke taur pe ek product batata hu. Ek product search kijiye aap wahin pe.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Garden spray bottle 2 liter.
Customer: Haanji, green wali photo second di hai.
Executive: Haan, haan, haan, correct, correct. Uske right hand side mein aap dekhenge to tank capacity missing karke aa raha hai.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Hai na? To jab aap view more view more pe click karenge, haan view more pe click karenge to wahan pe option aa jayega tank capacity 2 liter.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan, matlab specification open ho jayega jahan se aap select kar sakte hain usko.
Customer: Okay, theek hai.
Executive: Haan, usko phir save. Saath saath. Haan, usko jaise hi save karenge na to uska bhi score aapka dekhenge 15 point badh jayega. Matlab jo green color mein sare specification right side mein aa rahe hain har ek product ke aage that is a haan that is a very important specification of that particular product. To wo ek baar check karte jaiye ki kis mein missing hai. Usko fill karte jaiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai sir, wo main saath saath kar deti hu.
Executive: Done, done.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Main aapko kitne der mein connect kar lu?
Customer: Video meet ke liye to sir mere ko ek bari ma'am aa jaye office mein to main aapko bata sakti hu.
Executive: Haan. Nahi matlab video meet ke particular video meet ke liye nahi. Matlab is cheez ke liye jaise aapne sari images hata li hain aur agar aap apne side se images add kar rahe hain tab apne side se add kar lijiye nahi to aap mujhe bhej denge to main add kar lunga lekin mere paas 1000 pixel ki honi chahiye wo images.
Customer: Okay, main kar leti hu sir ek bari agar jo photos to phir mere paas bhi nahi hogi wo ma'am ko inform kar deti hu. Phir wo aapko ya phir mail kar denge agar jaisa wo kahenge ki aap kar do to wo main kar dungi sir.
Executive: Done, done, done.
Customer: Haan, ek bari mere paas jo photos hai wo upload kar deti hu phir aage main se puchungi.
Executive: Okay ma'am, okay, okay.
Customer: Okay. Thank you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know which images to remove.

- Missing specifications in some products.

- Image size is less for some products.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to connect via video meet.

- Explained how to add missing specifications.

- Suggested uploading images or sending them to executive.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will upload photos and consult manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- images, specification, product, video meet
